data.title: Text Align
data.solution:
limit = int(input())
text = input().split(' ')
r = []
for w in text:
    r2 = r + [w]
    l = len(' '.join(r2))
    if l > limit:
        stotal = limit - len(''.join(r))
        pos = 0
        while stotal:
            r[pos] += ' '
            pos = (pos + 1) % (len(r) - 1)
            stotal -= 1
        print(''.join(r))
        r = [w]
    else:
        r = r2
print(*r)
data.statement:
Align [[text]] to both left and right by adding extra spaces between words.
Each line (except the last) should be exactly [[limit]] characters long.

testCases.title: Test 1

data.constraints: There will always be at least two words in a row, except the last.
data.stubGenerator:
read limit:int
read text:string(1000)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
[[limit]] the exact length of each line.
[[text]] the text to split into lines aligned to the left and right.
data.outputDescription:
[[text]] split into lines of length [[limit]] aligned to the left and right.

In each line, spaces should be divided evenly between words.
If the number of spaces in a line does not divide evenly, the spaces on the left should be assigned one extra space more than the spaces on the right.

The last line should only be aligned to the left with a single space between words.

Do not add trailing spaces at the end of a line.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Align text to both left and right by adding extra spaces between words.
Each line (except the last) should be exactly limit characters long.
Input
limit the exact length of each line.
text the text to split into lines aligned to the left and right.
Output
text split into lines of length limit aligned to the left and right.

In each line, spaces should be divided evenly between words.
If the number of spaces in a line does not divide evenly, the spaces on the left should be assigned one extra space more than the spaces on the right.

The last line should only be aligned to the left with a single space between words.

Do not add trailing spaces at the end of a line.
Constraints
There will always be at least two words in a row, except the last.
Example
Input
30
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
Output
Lorem  ipsum  dolor  sit amet,
consectetur  adipiscing  elit,
sed    do    eiusmod    tempor
incididunt ut labore et dolore
magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim
veniam,      quis      nostrud
exercitation  ullamco  laboris
nisi  ut aliquip ex ea commodo
consequat.   Duis  aute  irure
dolor   in   reprehenderit  in
voluptate  velit  esse  cillum
dolore    eu    fugiat   nulla
pariatur.    Excepteur    sint
occaecat     cupidatat     non
proident,  sunt  in  culpa qui
officia  deserunt  mollit anim
id est laborum.
